project.name: Photo Tutor
project.aboutShort: A web application intended to be a tool to assist students with...
project.aboutFull: Description: A web application intended to be a tool to assist students with limited camera access and to help educators translate fundamental photography concept to groups. It is a proof of concept for a future version that could be expanded to include being gamified and tutorials. This is an AngularJS app that uses Firebase for authentication, data storage, and hosting. It also uses HTML/CSS, Saas, Bootstrap, and Grunt.

project.name: Med Records Keeper
project.aboutShort: Ever go for a Doctor visit and fill out a huge form only to find...
project.aboutFull: Description: Ever go for a Doctor visit and fill out a huge form only to find yourself a bit fuzzy on details like medications or family history? This app is designed to solve that issue and keep those records in detail, as well as serve the globetrotting types without a family Doctor. This app is built with a Ruby on Rails API using SQlite3 as the back-end and for the front-end it uses AngularJs, Saas, Bootstrap, and HTML/CSS. User login is handled with token-based authentication and task running is handled by Grunt.

project.name: Microwave Calculator
project.aboutShort: Description: A quick calculator to take your foods recommended time and...
project.aboutFull: Description: A quick calculator to take your foods recommended time and your microwave's power output to give you an adjusted time. I wanted to do a quick little Javascript project I could do quickly and get working. Now I need to come up with some creative ways to make it look good and be fun.
